task_description:
# Search Analytics Dashboard

Provide administrators with visual analytics dashboard showing search patterns, top searched users, search volume trends, service response times, and cache hit rates.

## Rationale
Understanding usage patterns helps optimize the system and demonstrate ROI. Addresses SailPoint's 'no clear benefits' complaint (pain-okta-2) by making value visible. Dashboard provides operational insights without complex reporting tools.

## User Stories
- As an IT director, I want to see usage analytics so that I can demonstrate WhoDis value to leadership
- As a system administrator, I want to see performance metrics so that I can identify optimization opportunities

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Dashboard page available to Admin role
- [ ] Charts: Search volume over time (day/week/month), Top 10 searched users, Search by source (LDAP/Graph/Genesys)
- [ ] Metrics: Average search time, Cache hit rate, Failed search rate
- [ ] Date range selector for all charts
- [ ] Real-time stats: Active sessions, Searches today, API token status
- [ ] Export dashboard data to PDF/PNG for presentations
